The NHAI had issued comprehensive guidelines for engagement of External Professionals (EPs) and Young Professionals (YPs) vide   Policy Circular dated 21.06.2017. 2 The issue regarding applicability of the Maternity Benefit Act; 1961,as covered under Clause 12 under the heading Statutory provisions in Policy Circular dated 21.06.2017_ has been examined and it is clarified that the remuneration to EPs & YPs is neither salary nor wages, but Professionals Charges and hence, the same is being booked under the head professional expenses/ consultancy charges. Accordingly, there is no employee/ employer relationship between EPs/YPs and NHAl and thereforea the EPs and YPs engaged by the NHAI are not entitled to benefits admissible under Maternity Benefit Act, 1961_ 3_ This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority: Isey (V.K.
